scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && npm run prestart
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-express.js -c -m -o build/d3-express.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/d3-express.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-express.js build/d3-express.min.js
